Let's Talk

Integrated Teams

Fully integrating with your in-house team, talented Devsu Engineers give your project the added horsepower it needs to get to the finish line fast.

Managed Teams

An autonomous team of Devsu Engineers, managed by veteran Product and Project Managers, deliver results aligning to the needs of your business.

Software Outsourcing

From MVP to growth, Devsu provides full-cycle custom software development. You provide the specifications, we bring your product to market– fast.

Only The Best

Our talent pool runs deep, so your Devsu team always comes equipped with the industry’s top 5% of tech talent— and that’s just the beginning. Our rigorous hiring process and on-going training ensure our teams’ (and your’s) continuous improvement.

OUR EXPERTISE

What we do

Our teams are aligned with the technology trends in your industry, always ready to lead any project, no matter the size or complexity, and with the right skill and know-how.

Custom Software Development

We bring a user-centric approach to software development and design to improve the experience and performance.

Testing & Quality Assurance

Testing at every stage of the process helps us minimize your business risk and maximize dependability of your digital products.

Cloud Computing & DevOps

The benefits and cost savings of cloud technologies are critical to ensuring your products change and grow with your customers.

AI & Data Science

Devsu specializes in a multitude of statistical techniques that use your data to pre-process, analyze and predict events from big data sets.

Digital Product & Software Delivery Strategy

Devsu understands and makes sense of technology, translating complex requirements into digestible and easy to use features.

Product Design

The best products are those that fill a need or a gap. Creating products is a science as much as it is an art that should use data, research and your business goals as guides.

...And The Technologies

We stay in-the-know. As practitioners of the most innovative technologies and methodologies on the market, we’re continuously learning the latest and greatest to build your product better and faster
